SRI.P.SHAIJAN JOSEPH SRI.SANTOSH PETER, SR.PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 08.01.2021, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Eee | Oa Crl.MC.No.3183 OF 2017 2021/KER/1223 2 ORDER Dated this the 8th day of January 2021 This Crl.M.C is filed to quash the FIR in Crime No.2387/2016 of Aluva Police Station. This Cr1.M.C was filed in 2017 and no interim order was passed in this case. The learned counsel submitted that he is not aware what happened to the case. There is no purpose in keeping this Cr1.M.C pending. If any Final Report is filed in Crime No.2387/2016 by the Aluva Police against the petitioners, the petitioners are free to challenge the Final Report. With this liberty this Cr1.M.C is dismissed.
